items.title: How to Lose Weight After 40: The 3 Things That Matter Most
items.summary_ru: Статья посвящена проблеме похудения для женщин после 40 лет, объясняет физиологические изменения и предлагает три ключевых принципа, основанных на работе с метаболизмом и гормонами.
items.content_excerpt:
How to Lose Weight After 40: The 3 Things That Matter Most
Over 40
If you are struggling to lose weight after 40 – if you feel like what used to work suddenly doesn’t anymore – you are absolutely not alone.
In fact, this is one of the most common things I hear from women: “
I’m eating clean… I’m working out… but the scale hasn’t moved.
”
Or:
“I used to drop weight so easily. Now I feel like I’m doing everything right and nothing is happening
.”
You’re not imagining it.
Weight loss is harder in m

items.title: How to Reverse Bone Loss: My Journey From Osteopenia to Strong Bones
items.summary_ru: Личная история женщины о преодолении остеопении и восстановлении плотности костей через питание, тренировки и изменение образа жизни.
items.content_excerpt:
How to Reverse Bone Loss: My Journey From Osteopenia to Strong Bones
Over 40
How I Reversed Bone Loss and Ostepenia Naturally
If you are wondering how to reverse bone loss or how to reverse osteopenia – I know how scary and overwhelming it feels. In this article, I share my
personal journey of reversing bone loss, along with practical tips and encouragement to help you build stronger, healthier bones.
In my early 20s, I found out that I had osteopenia. The doctor told me my bones looked like tho

items.title: What to Eat Before and After a Workout: Simple Nutrition Guide for Women
items.summary_ru: Статья представляет собой простое руководство по питанию до и после тренировки, ориентированное на женщин, с акцентом на важность белка, углеводов и времени приема пищи для повышения энергии, восстановления и роста мышц.
items.content_excerpt:
What to Eat Before and After a Workout: Simple Nutrition Guide for Women
Female Nutrition
Not sure what to eat before or after a workout? Proper
pre- and post-workout nutrition for women
can boost energy, build and preserve muscle, and speed recovery. In this guide, you’ll learn simple, research-backed tips on protein, carbs and meal timing so that you can get the best possible results from your workouts.
I’ve also put everything into a video if that’s more your style:
Why Workout Nutrition Matt

items.title: Body Fat Percentage For Abs In Women: Is It Realistic For You?
items.summary_ru: Статья реалистично рассматривает тему достижения видимого пресса у женщин, объясняя необходимый процент жира, сложности поддержания и компромиссы для здоровья.
items.content_excerpt:
Body Fat Percentage For Abs In Women: Is It Realistic For You?
Female Fitness
Is It Possible To Get Visible Abs?
If you feel frustrated with your midsection – you’re not alone. For many women it can feel like no matter how well they eat or how hard they train, the stomach region doesn’t change – especially with age. Online, it can look like everyone else has a lean, defined stomach… which only adds to the pressure.
The truth? Visible abs are possible, but they
come at a cost that most of us aren

items.title: The Best Way To Train Over 40: Build Strength, Muscle & Shape
items.summary_ru: Статья адресована женщинам старше 40 лет и фокусируется на силовых тренировках для сохранения мышечной массы, силы и формы, что соответствует целям возрастной аудитории фитнес-сайта.
items.content_excerpt:
The Best Way To Train Over 40: Build Strength, Muscle & Shape
Female Fitness
,
Over 40
If you’re in your 40s or 50s and confused about the best way to train, you’re not alone. Should you lift heavy? Stick to light weights so you don’t get bulky or injured? Do high-intensity circuits to burn more fat?
There’s a lot of conflicting advice out there, and much of it isn’t tailored to what women in midlife actually need – or want. In this article, I’ll break down
the best way to train over 40
– especi

items.title: Back Fat After 40 – 3 Smart Exercises And What Actually Works
items.summary_ru: Статья объясняет невозможность локального жиросжигания и предлагает три упражнения для укрепления мышц спины, что соответствует принципам HIIT/TABATA, где силовые элементы часто комбинируются с кардио для общего жиросжигания.
items.content_excerpt:
Back Fat After 40 – 3 Smart Exercises And What Actually Works
Female Fitness
,
Over 40
,
Videos
Struggling with back fat, bra bulge, or that stubborn softness just above your hips? You’re not alone — and today I’m breaking down the truth about back fat and showing you three of my favorite exercises to help shape and strengthen your back.
In this video, I explain what really causes back fat, why exercise alone isn’t the full answer, and how
smart strength training
can still make a big difference

items.title: Shoulder Exercises for Women 40+ | Build Balanced, Pain-Free Shoulders
items.summary_ru: Статья предлагает упражнения для плеч, специально адаптированные для женщин старше 40 лет, с акцентом на безопасность суставов, профилактику боли и коррекцию осанки.
items.content_excerpt:
Shoulder Exercises for Women 40+ | Build Balanced, Pain-Free Shoulders
Female Fitness
,
Over 40
,
Videos
Want stronger, more balanced shoulders? In this video, I’ll show you my favorite shoulder exercises for women over 40 – designed to shape your shoulders and keep them safe as you train.
Shoulder issues are common as we age and may in fact be related to the decline in estrogen we experience around menopause. However, with the right movements and technique, you can build strength and prevent in

items.title: Sarah’s Strength Journey: From Mindset To Muscle
items.summary_ru: Статья представляет собой мотивационный кейс-стори о трансформации Сары, где акцент сделан на изменении мышления и формировании привычек, а не на конкретных тренировочных методиках.
items.content_excerpt:
Sarah’s Strength Journey: From Mindset To Muscle
Testimonials
When Sarah first joined my program, her goal was weight loss – but what’s been even more powerful is how she’s transformed her
mindset and strength
along the way.
In 8 months, Sarah has lost 37.2 pounds, but more than that, she’s become someone who consistently shows up for herself, no matter what life throws her way. She’s faced some big challenges – caring for her mother, changing careers, thyroid issues, perimenopausal hormone swin

items.title: Amanda’s Weight Loss Success Story: Showing Up, No Matter What
items.summary_ru: Статья представляет собой мотивационный кейс похудения и трансформации Аманды, где акцент сделан на последовательности тренировок, смене мышления с потери веса на рост силы и мышц, что хорошо вписывается в контекст дисциплинированных тренировочных методик.
items.content_excerpt:
Amanda’s Weight Loss Success Story: Showing Up, No Matter What
Testimonials
Today marks 200 complete workouts AND the finish of 11 weeks straight of completing all my workouts. In this last 11 weeks I have started increasing weight and/or reps on a more intentional basis. My mindset is shifting from weight loss to muscle definition and growth. I have 6 pounds give or take still to lose to get me to my goal weight, but if I end up sacrificing that for muscle development and consistency I won’t be

items.title: Shape Your Arms – Express Workout
items.summary_ru: Статья представляет собой краткое описание экспресс-тренировки для рук, ориентированной на женскую аудиторию, с перечислением конкретных упражнений и упоминанием программ тренировок.
items.content_excerpt:
Shape Your Arms – Express Workout
Female Fitness
,
Videos
If you are short on time, this Express Arm Workout is for you! Use your time and lighter weights wisely to get the most out of your session and shape up your arms.
Exercises shown include:
✅ Cable Cross Tricep Extensions
✅ Bicep Superset: Drag Curls and No-Money Curls
✅ Floor Press
If you love Express workouts, every program I write has an Express version and workouts can be done in about 30 minutes. When you sign up, I will send you a co

items.title: HEALTH ADVICE I NO LONGER GIVE
items.summary_ru: Статья представляет собой анонс или введение к домашней тренировке с гантелями, но основной текст фрагмента содержит в основном элементы социального шаринга и ссылки, а не фитнес-контент.
items.content_excerpt:
At Home Full Body Workout with Dumbbells
Feeling softer, tired, or like your workouts aren’t working anymore? You’re not alone. Midlife, hormones, and mom-life chaos change everything — but the solution is simpler than you think. You don’t need hours of cardio. You need smart, efficient 30-minute strength training you can do at home to feel strong, lean and energized again.

Healthworks Community Fitness is a 501c3 public charity dedicated to helping achieve health equity. Healthworks Community Fitness provides high quality fitness and wellness education to all women in underserved neighborhoods to prevent and manage chronic disease, improve health and promote well-being and empowerment.

September marks National Yoga Month, a time to honor this ancient practice that has transformed millions of lives worldwide. While yoga might appear to be simply stretching and breathing, its impact reaches far beyond the physical poses you see on our social media feed.
The Science Behind the Serenity
Modern research continues to validate what practitioners have known for centuries: yoga creates profound changes in both body and mind. Regular practice has been shown to reduce stress hormones, lo

items.title: 6 Reasons to Book a Summer Massage
items.summary_ru: Статья описывает 6 причин записаться на летний массаж, фокусируясь на общих преимуществах массажа для снятия отеков, мышечной боли и стресса, вызванных летней активностью.
items.content_excerpt:
Massage therapy offers several benefits during the summer months, including reducing swelling and inflammation, relieving muscle tension from increased activity, and decreasing stress. The heat and humidity of summer can exacerbate swelling in joints and limbs, while increased outdoor activity can lead to muscle soreness. Massage can improve circulation, reduce swelling, and promote relaxation, helping you stay comfortable and active throughout the season.

items.title: Why heat hits different for female athletes
items.summary_ru: Статья исследует специфические физиологические особенности терморегуляции у женщин-спортсменок во время тренировок в жару, подчеркивая недостаток исследований с участием женщин и важность учета этих различий для эффективности и безопасности.
items.content_excerpt:
Home
Training
Why heat hits different for female athletes
Training
Why heat hits different for female athletes
Pedro van Gaalen
January 14, 2026
0
0
167
When it comes to training or racing in the elements, heat management can separate a strong finish from a struggle to the line or, worse, a DNF. While both male and female athletes face physiological challenges when exercising in hot and humid conditions, the way our bodies respond to heat stress is distinctly different.

items.summary_ru: Статья посвящена поддержанию здоровья кишечника в праздничный сезон, затрагивая темы питания, стресса и восстановления, но не имеет прямого отношения к фитнес-тренировкам.

The holiday season is synonymous with travel, festive feasting, social gatherings, late nights, and well-earned indulgence. But behind the celebrations, rich foods, excess sugar, alcohol, disrupted routines, and heightened stress can quietly disrupt gut health — often without immediate warning signs.

items.title: The new 50’s
items.summary_ru: Статья о поддержании здоровья и баланса гормонов для женщин в возрасте 50+, упоминает пилатес-программу с использованием специального оборудования, но не фокусируется на интенсивных интервальных тренировках.
items.content_excerpt:
The New 50’s
Turning 50 certainly feels like a milestone, but somehow less dauting that it might have felt to the generation before, as we have more access to pioneering ways that we can move better, balance our hormones, get glowy skin and calm our minds. As our life becomes more challenging in our 50’s, we are pulled in different directions, as we balance looking after teenagers and elderly parents, our needs can easily get left behind.
My little black book of the best things that can take us

items.title: Resistance Training 101: Why You Need It Now
items.summary_ru: Статья представляет собой базовое введение в силовые тренировки, объясняя их принципы, преимущества и сравнивая с кардио. Основной акцент сделан на общих принципах набора мышечной массы и ускорения метаболизма.
items.content_excerpt:
Body
Resistance Training 101: Why You Need It Now
September 1, 2025
Resistance Training 101
Resistance training is simply any exercise that challenges your muscles by working against weight or resistance. The beauty? You don’t need a gym membership or fancy exercise equipment. Your own body weight, resistance bands, or a few dumbbells are all you need to start building a stronger and healthier body.
When you work your muscles against resistance, your body responds to the challenge by adapting an
